title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Understanding Physiological Principles of Venous Return – A Progressive Model-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: The fundamental principles of venous return (circulating filling pressure, vascular compliance, and oncotic pressure) can be expressed as mathematical graphs
Simulate the process of calculating blood distribution changes during the cardiac cycle using central venous pressure (CVP) and mean arterial pressure (MAP)
Predict the impact of vascular resistance/compliance changes on CVP and cardiac output through equation-based modeling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
